Department of Agriculture, Water and the Environment
Department of Agriculture, Water and the Environment
Senior knowledge holders from the Gamilaraay, Yuwaalaraay & Yuwaalayaay languages
Department of Agriculture, Water and the Environment

abstract.para: Resolved taxonomy built from AusFungi, AusMoss, AFD, APNI/APC, NZOR, CAAB, Catalogue of Life and ALA species lists

additionalInfo.para: Created by combining source taxonomies using the ala-name-matching algorithms. See https://github.com/AtlasOfLivingAustralia/ala-name-matching for more information.
